# Bot.Info

Bot.Info is a node.js module for the website [botinfo.gq](https://botinfo.gq/) used to upload bot data and publicize it to show stats and receive stats from anywhere

## Installation

Use the package manager [npm](https://nodejs.org/en/download) to install bot.info.

```bash
npm install bot.info
```

## Usage

Add the following code to your discord bot
```javascript
const botInfo = require('bot.info');

setInterval(() => {
	botInfo.updateData(client.user.id, client.guilds.cache.size, client.users.cache.size, "TOKEN (find it at botinfo.gq/user/settings")
}, 120000)
```

Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.
